text: Swag is the fourth solo album by former Guns N' Roses guitarist Gilby Clarke, released in 2002. ==Track List== #Alien #Under the Gun #Crocodile Tears #Broken Down Car #Margarita #I'm Nobody #Judgement Day #Beware of the Dog #Heart of Chrome #Warm Country Sun #Diamond Dogs ==References== * * Category:2002 albums
title: Swag (album)
